course_overview.course_description: This course introduces beginner learners to the innovative world of storytelling and storyboarding using generative AI, equipping them with the skills to create compelling narratives and visual content. Participants will explore the fundamentals of storytelling, including plot, character, and setting, and learn how to apply these elements using AI-generated text prompts. The course covers the use of AI models for script generation, enabling learners to develop unique story elements and refine AI-generated content for clarity and engagement. Through practical exercises, learners will gain hands-on experience in creating effective storyboards and generating AI-enhanced visual storytelling elements, preparing them for roles in the media industry where such skills are increasingly in demand.
